name: ptools-uploadcounter
title: Upload Counter
description: An upload counter for Commons (Number of files, distribution of uploads in time and type).
author: Pleclown

name: ptools-findfiles
title: Commons files finder
description: Find files by a user in a Commons category (or files by a user not in a Commons category).
author: Pleclown

name: ptools-uploadersincat
title: Commons Uploaders in cat
description: List uploaders and number of files by uploader in a Commons category.
author: Pleclown

name: ptools-filesincat
title: Commons files in cat
description: Displays informations on a Commons category.
author: Pleclown

name: ptools-useractions
title: Useractions
description: An action (as defined in MediaWiki) counter.
author: Pleclown

name: ptools-intertwined
title: Intertwined contributions
description: Displays the last 1000 cumulated contributions of two users on a wiki.
author: Pleclown
